Articles.Content: I guess we need to know what you’re here for.
Thread has been moved to the Lounge.   Since all posts in KSP Discussion, by definition, are about KSP, this question is best located in a section that serves multiple purposes.

2 hours ago, Gargamel said:

Thread has been moved to the Lounge.   Since all posts in KSP Discussion, by definition, are about KSP, this question is best located in a section that serves multiple purposes. 

Good call. I only recently installed 1.12 and started playing again after giving up on my 1.8 career probably at least a year ago. But I still haunt these forums on a probably too-regular basis because it’s the best forum around, unpolluted by politics. 

And since I’ve been on this forum for nine years now (!!) I’ve discussed KSP to death, and rarely visit that subforum.
I play KSP and chatter, but until I started my mission report thread I rarely posted about KSP.
Moved back to category 1 very, very recently
